AdditionalFields.Value: Clinical Research Excluding Trials,Prevention / Early Detection / Interception,Pediatric Cancer

Description: Methods for circulating tumor DNA analysis have advanced rapidly in the last several years. While some applications such as genotyping for actionable mutations are well established, areas such as early detection as well as response monitoring in patients with advanced and early stage cancer have seen continuous innovation in computational and molecular methods. This education session will highlight some of the recent developments in these areas, outstanding challenges, and opportunities for future work.
SearchResultBody: ED026. Liquid Biopsies for Detection and Monitoring: Challenges and Opportunities
Title: Liquid Biopsies for Detection and Monitoring: Challenges and Opportunities
